description: large fields in center of image made up of rectangular light blue paper with hole below center and tears and roughly rectangular foxed cream paper with brown and left edge and area of red marks at right center; fragments of predominately printed text in various languages and type fonts around edges; some colored paper elements predominately at right side
medium: Collage on paper mounted on canvas
provenance: (Esther Bear Gallery, Santa Barbara, until 1966; sold, December, for $561.60, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara, Calif. (1966-d. 2010); bequeathed to MIA, 2012.
title: Tally IV
